videos.description: Ja Morant throws an alley oop to set up Shaq Buchanan who connects on the two-handed dunk.
videos.headline: Morant throws up sweet alley-oop for dunk

videos.description: Ja Morant throws an alley oop to Brion Sanchious who delivers a two-handed slam in transition.
videos.headline: Morant throws up another sweet pass for a dunk

videos.description: Ja Morant tosses up another alley-oop assist, finding KJ Williams for the dunk.
videos.headline: Morant finding his teammates on demand
